name: Teresa Reiniger
seeking: Seeking grief counselors and podcast networks for group coaching and audience sharing. Mental health professionals for living-after-loss content collaborations.
who_you_serve: Individuals experiencing grief seeking group coaching, mental health support, and resources for living after loss.
what_you_do: Help people navigate grief through group coaching, podcasting, and mental health support.
business_focus: Help people navigate grief through group coaching, podcasting, and mental health support. (grief recovery)

jv_history.partner_name: Season 2, Episode 3 ~ Finding Purpose After Loss: A Grief Coach’s Story with Teresa Reiniger
jv_history.source_quote: this episode, co-host LaWayna Berry interviews Teresa Reiniger, exploring her journey from profound personal loss to becoming a grief coach and community builder. Teresa ... **Connect with Teresa:**
